Page 1 
 
                                                                                                                                                                          
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
   Looking  for opportunities to improve tec hnical and professional acumen.  Would  like to 
handle challenging assignments and give them a bette r shape through innovative ideas.  
 
 Professional Overview  
 
            17 year of rich & proven experience in Electrical Engineering  Erection,  Operation and 
Maintenance works . 
 Work Experience with L.T System,  Rising Main, Bus Duct , DG Sets, Main LT Panel,  VCB 
Panel, PLC Panel , Ventillation Panel  External  Electrical, internal Electrical  and Landscape 
Electrification . 
 Electrical installation consists of 33 KV/0.415  KV Substation of  LT System  and 100% back -
up by LT DG Sets.  
 Experience in  cable laying, routing , Panel erection, installation and commissioning.  
 Experience  in Earthing  System (Earthing Pit, LT & HT Panel Earthing)  and Lighting arrester.  
 Experience  of Pre-Paid Energy Meter System , Fire Detection Alarm System , CCTV, TV -
System  and EPABX System.  
 
Key Re sponsibility Handled   
 
 Good understanding of Electrical Drawings,  Site Execution,  installation, Testing 
Commissioning  & Maintenance at site.  
 Prepares necessary correspondence, technical reports, contract documents, fact sheets and 
status reports and prepar es final construction drawings suitable for obtaining qualified bids 
from Contractors  
 Develops cost estimates and time schedules, reviews and analyzes preliminary and final 
designs, plans and specifications for technical efficiency and adequacy.  
 Responsibl e for the correct and efficient execution of assigned work involving the 
installation, removal, inspection, maintenance and repair of all electrical systems, 
distribution systems and fixtures.  
 Supervises and coordinates activities of workers engaged in the  assembly, installation and 
repair of electrical cables, systems power distribution systems, distribution panels, 
inspections, etc.  
 Checking contractor’s bill, coordinate with various agencies involved & making progress 
report of the work executed etc.  
 Take corrective and preventive measures to ensure that all the accidents are prevented.  
 Complies with health, safety and environmental rules and procedures and performs work in 
a manner that enhances the safety of the work environment.  
 Lalit Mohan Sahoo  
Email   : lalitsahoo30@gmail.com  
Mobile  : +91-9938 304845 , +91 -8249591792
